H0.text: Ardbeg is whisky distillery on which Scottish island. Skye

H1.text: Ardbeg is whisky distillery on which Scottish island. Mull

H2.text: Ardbeg is whisky distillery on which Scottish island. Jura

H3.text: Ardbeg is whisky distillery on which Scottish island. Islay

A4.text: From east to west they are Ardbeg, Lagavulin, and Laphroaig.
